text: Is there a reason why a form submission's  `conversionId` isn't included in the response to `GET /form-integrations/v1/submissions/forms/:form_guid` ? (More info in thread)
The UI makes a call to `<https://app.HubSpot.com/api-passthrough/forms/v2/formsubmissions/form/><form_id>?limit=10&portalId=<portal_id>&clienttimeout=15000`
and the response to ^^^ has `conversionId` and a bunch of additional data

Hi, does anyone know of a way to update the contact Salesforce ID via the API?
I'm having issues with salesforce contact merging. My users keep selecting the contact that is not linked to HubSpot as the master record and this is causing the sync to break.
